resources.string: The Launcher for the fiskaltrust.Middleware is installed on this device and will listen for incoming start requests.
Clearing the app data will delete all fiscalization data stored on this device.
This action cannot be undone. Don\'t proceed, unless you\'re instructed to do so by technical support.
The fiskalturst.Middleware is used by your POS System to fulfill compliance regulations. Some permissions need to be grantet before it can work properly.
